definition[0]: a special wall built across a river or stream to stop the water from flowing, especially in order to make a lake or produce electricity
definition[1]: the mother of a four-legged animal, especially a horse
definition[2]: to stop the water in a river or stream from flowing by building a special wall across it
definition[3]: to stop something from being expressed or continuing
example[0]: Once she allowed her anger to show, it could not be dammed up again.
